description:
Komlin IV was another giant robot made by http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui Lee] that attacked http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen], http://anidb.net/ch7369 [Krory] and http://anidb.net/ch7363 [Lavi] when the Gatekeeper perceived Krory as an Akuma. It made Lavi into an omelet, and dumped salt and oil on Allen and Krory.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki
name: Komlin IV
